sentences.english: This method is a common practice in the treatment of sores and carbuncles in TCM surgery.
sentences.chinese: 托法是中医外科用以治疗疮疡的一种常用内治法。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo establish the production technology and quality control of black plaster and skin and external disease plaster.
sentences.chinese: 目标研究黑膏药疮疡膏的生产工艺及质量标准。

definition: localized pain disorder (in Chinese medicine)/arthralgia syndrome/bi disorder
injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc
condition characterized by thirst, hunger, frequent urination and weight loss, identified in TCM with type 2 diabetes
(TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang/asthenia
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
